meaning_str.bing:
prep. 每；每一
网络. 蛋白质功效比值(protein efficiency ratio)；由；垂足

蛋白质功效比值(protein efficiency ratio)；由；垂足

每；每一；按照；根据；通过；依据；经由；依照；按每；凭借；利用；对于每个；按比例

1.en: Because of the stateless nature of IIS and ASP. NET, a method decorated with this attribute might be called more than once per test run.
1.cn: 由于IIS和ASP.NET的无状态特性，用此属性修饰的方法在每个测试运行中可以多次调用。

2.en: All that, says Dan Smith, a metals analyst at the bank, could push the price up to $8, 000 per tonne this year.
2.cn: 渣打金属分析师丹·史密斯（DanSmith）表示，这一切可能会推动铜价今年攀上每吨8000美元。

3.en: Moreover, there is no reason to balance budgets in a country whose nominal GDP grows at up to 5 per cent a year in normal times.
3.cn: 此外，一个正常情况下名义GDP年增幅不超过5%的国家，没有理由去平衡预算。

0.en: Granted, chewing gum contains around 10 calories per piece.
0.cn: 事实上，每片口香糖有10卡路里。

1.en: When I deliver. $500 per unit and you've got a deal.
1.cn: 我交货的时候每台给我500美元我们就成交了。

2.en: Each coral struggles against its neighbors to gain more light at the speed of a few millimetres per year.
2.cn: 每株珊瑚每年生长数毫米，以此与邻居争夺阳光。

3.en: What makes it so, "super"? 242 mile per hour, top speed. And, it's bulletproof.
3.cn: 超跑是怎么个“超”法儿？最高时速达到242英里每小时，而且还是防弹的。

4.en: It's the equivalent of crashing at 94 miles per hour into a wall with a door in front of it.
4.cn: 这相当于以94英里每小时的速度顶着它前面的一扇门撞进墙里。

5.en: I know. 150 calories per six ounce. Yeah. You keep counting calories, and you're gonna really turn me on.
5.cn: 我知道。每六盎司150卡路里。是啊。你一直在算热量，你这样可真的要让我兴奋。

6.en: You take an onion that has a price point of maybe 32 cents per pound, and you turn it into this product. This is an onion?
6.cn: 你拿一个洋葱，大约每磅32美分，然后把它变成这种产品。这是个洋葱?

7.en: You won the exact same number of games that the Yankees won, but the Yankees spent 1.4 million per win, and you paid 260,000.
7.cn: 你赢的场次和扬基队一样多，但是扬基队每赢一场要花一百四十万，你只用二十六万。

8.en: There are over 7 million people here with 57,000 people per square kilometer in places. To house them all, the city has had to build upwards.
8.cn: 这里有七百多万人，基本上每平方公里达五万七千人。为了安置所有人，城市必须向上建造。

9.en: The cell towers were operating at more than 200 watts, producing ground-level absorption figures far in excess of the SAR limit of 1.6 watts per kilogram.
9.cn: 信号塔运作功率超过200瓦，因此产生的地面接收信号远超SAR系统每千米1.6瓦的限制。

10.en: Okay. I'll pay $450 per machine. $450. On delivery, nothing up front. I know it's asking a lot, Steve. But it's a big payoff if you deliver.
10.cn: 好吧，我每台给你450美元，货到付款，没有预付款，这需要你投入很多，史蒂夫，但是如果你能正常交货，你的回报也很多。

11.en: Even though we've reduce the calories per serving, these beverages can still cause kidney problems, obesity, metabolic syndrome, cell damage and rotten teeth.
11.cn: 尽管我们已经减低了每罐饮料的卡路里含量，这些饮料依旧能够造成肾脏疾病、肥胖代谢症候群、细胞损坏以及腐蚀牙齿等问题。

12.en: When you come back to Earth in a Soyuz capsule, you free fall from space at 500 miles per hour, and the only thing that slows you down is a little parachute that pops out right before you crash into the ground.
12.cn: 当你坐着联盟号太空舱返回地球时，你会以每小时500英里的速度自由落体，唯一帮你减速的东西是你撞向地面的前一刻弹出的小小降落伞。

13.en: They exchange a thousand bits of information between them per second.
13.cn: 每秒可以交换一千位的信息。

14.en: One hundred billion neurons per human of which only fifteen percent are activated.
14.cn: 每个人拥有一千亿个神经元，我们只启动15%。

15.en: Now, if you assume 15 tampons per cycle and a 28-day cycle. Are you fairly regular?
15.cn: 现在假设你每次用15条，28天一周期，你经期正常吗？

16.en: Professor, my cells are reproducing at a phenomenal speed. Several million per second.
16.cn: 教授，我的细胞正在飞速增长，每秒增生几百万个。

17.en: We have you booked into the Jewel Suite until Wednesday. The charge is 22,000 per night.
17.cn: 您的朱厄尔套房星期三到期，费用是每晚两万二美元。

18.en: And how much profit do you make per Penny blossom? I don't know, like, 50 cents. I'm not sure.
18.cn: 每个...佩妮花花能赚多少？不知道，50美分吧，不确定。

19.en: You're going after child labor? Seriously? Erik worked four hours a day, five days a week per photo.
19.cn: 你是想说童工吗？你确定吗？埃里克拍一张照片，每天要工作4小时，一周工作五天。
